Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Panel

  • public class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
    The status panel. Renders itself to a fixed position in the bottom-right corner of the screen, displaying the player's race ranking and item. (See the render() method.)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image panel
      Image for the panel background.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new Panel.

        public Panel()
      throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

    • Method Detail

      • ordinal

        public static java.lang.String ordinal(int ranking)
        Turn a cardinal number into an ordinal. For example, takes a ranking such as 2, and returns a String "2nd". Note: Won't work for numbers greater than 20.

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                   int ranking,
                   Item item)
        Renders the status panel for the player.
        Parameters:
        g - The current Slick graphics context.
        ranking - The player's current position in the race (1 = 1st, 2 = 2nd, etc).
        item - The player's currently-held item, or null.
